description:
Lysandre`s Pyroar was first seen battling against Alan while he was searching for a Denryunite in some ruins and Lysandre challenged him to a battle where Alan could claim the stone if he won the battle. Alan lost the battle.
It was seen once again when it broke up a battle between Alan (Kalos) and Steven Stone.
name: Kaenjishi (Fleur-de-lis)
